name: Fitness Master-Calorie Killer
description:
Are you ready be a part of the most magical journey ever?
Now you have the opportunity to become a fitness trainer in an easy idle game! Your goal is to turn an over-weighted man into a strong person and urge him/her to train every day. First, you have to train the physical fitness of the exerciser. Increase his/her maximum physical strength and the speed of post-training recovery. This way you can keep him/her working-out continuously. You will experience unprecedented pride when you see your trainees getting stronger and healthy every day.
What else are you able to achieve in this game? A coin-clicker! You just click and you will get free coins. Keep clicking and keep earning! Don't worry about your trainees slacking off when you are not in the game. We offer all trainers offline rewards, which you can claim when you return to the game.

Features:
1.Easy to play. You just click to train your trainees.
2.Casual game. You can play anytime, anywhere.
3.Over 50+ healthy questions you can get in our game!

Enjoy the game and keep yourself a healthy lifestyle! Wish you a happy life!
